mapper.select: select * from exticket where et_email=#{value} and et_state in('BU','BC' )
select count(*) from exticket where et_email=#{value} and et_state in('BU','BC' )
select * from (select row_number() over(order by et_buydate) line, exticket.* from exticket where et_state ='AU' and et_email=#{email}) where line between #{limit} and #{limit}+9

mapper.update: update exhibition set sales_count = sales_count-(select et_count from exticket where et_booknumber=#{booknumber}) where e_name = (select et_title from exticket where et_booknumber=#{booknumber})
mapper.select: select * from (select row_number() over(order by merchant_uid) line, merchant_uid, TO_CHAR(pay_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS pay_time, p.g_name, g_num, e_name, gp_sysname, p.g_option, g_count, totalprice, state from payment p join goods g using (g_num) left join exhibition e using (e_num) join goodspic gp using (g_num) where email = #{email}) where line between #{limit} and #{limit}+9
